segments.text: I believe that you called me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , hi . Thanks for getting back to me quickly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was calling about your son .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your son was acting up in class .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He was talking and causing a disturbance during class .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you could just talk to him , I would greatly appreciate it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I apologize , and I'll make sure he doesn't do that again .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry about it , but thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S2
